definition[0]: a small piece of old cloth, for example one used for cleaning things
example[0]: He wiped his boots dry with an old rag.
definition[1]: a newspaper, especially one that you think is not particularly important or of good quality
example[2]: He writes for the local rag.
definition[3]: an event organized by students every year in order to make money for people who are poor, sick etc
definition[4]: to laugh at someone or play tricks on them
